scripts.preinstall: echo '=== PRE-INSTALL DEBUG ===' && echo 'Node version:' && node --version && echo 'NPM version:' && npm --version && echo 'Working directory:' && pwd && echo 'Environment:' && env | grep -E '(NODE|NPM|PATH)' && echo '=== END PRE-INSTALL ==='
scripts.postinstall: echo '=== POST-INSTALL DEBUG ===' && echo 'Checking Playwright:' && npm list playwright || echo 'Playwright check failed' && echo 'Node modules size:' && du -sh node_modules && echo '=== END POST-INSTALL ==='
